body.name: Twin Tub Washer,15lbs Portable Washing Machine w/Washer and Spinner Combo,Gravity Drain,Semi-Automatic Laundry Machine,Compact washer for Dormitory, College, RV, Camping,Blue
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
features: 🧺【Twin Tub Washer】 Mini Washing Machine have a feature of twin tub design, this portable washer equipped with washing function and drying function as one.You can directly move the washed clothes to the spinning tub for saving your precious time,which offers great convenience for you.

🧺【Simple Operation】 Intelligent operation panel on Laundry Machine helps you control duration and mode.Three twists for cleaning timing,spining timing and choosing mode. Wash timer: 0-15 mins, spin timer: 0-5 mins. Three Modes:Soft/Standard/Drain.

🧺【Compact Desin】 Compact design of twin tub washing machine allows you to move and transit it to anyplace.Item weight: 22Lbs.Perfect for apartments, dorms, RVs, save space and bring convenience to your daily life.

🧺【Drain Pump】 Portable Mini Washer with inlet pipe and drain pipe have a drainage pump, draining dirty water by drainage tube from washer. suitable for most family. Easy storage and space saving design.

🧺【Filter&Transparent&cover plate】 Convenient for home use with a filter net on the side of the washing tub. The cover plate needs to be put above the clothes inside when using the spin tub to avoid high speed shaking and spinning. Transparent body design allows you to check your cloth anytime, conveniently and practically for daily life.

🧺【High Quality】 Thanks to the high quality , this Laundry Machine does not deform and rust easily, and has a long service life. We have professional customer service, contact us if there is any product issue, any email will be replied within 24 hours.
body.description: Operation Steps Put a load of laundry into the washing tub. Hook up a water inlet or fill in water with a bucket or hose. Add a teaspoon of liquid laundry detergent in to the wash tub. Set the wash timer, 0~15 minutes according to your needs. Washing over,take clothes to the spinner tub and put plastic plate covering the clothes. Set spin timer,0~5mins,then take drained clothes out. Let clothes dry in the wind naturally

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Drying Plate Remember to put this plastic disc in to drying tub when the washer starts spinning.That help achieve better drying effect.Our machine can make 80%-90% drying that means clothes still need sunshine. Drain Hose The washing machine is supported by gravity drain. There is a outlet pipe on one side.Please hung it up when not in use to reduce wear and pipe breakage.Humanized detail design for everyone. Water Inlet A hole on the left side,you can freely install the hose based on your faucet location.Besides,mini washer equipped a metal ring to help connect the faucet and water pipe Removable Filter When washing tub working,filter of washer machine help filter some solid wastes. Please disassemble it and clean regularly. If you have any problem,we will reply you within 24 hours.

SPECIFICATION Color: Blue/Black Material: PP,stainless steel Overall Dimension:24.8"*22.1"*15.0" Voltage：110V，50/60HZ Net Weight：24.2lbs Package include:1*washing machine,1*inlet horse,1*Metal buckle Operation Steps Put a load of laundry into the washing tub. Hook up a water inlet or fill in water with a bucket or hose. Add a teaspoon of liquid laundry detergent in to the wash tub. Set the wash timer, 0~15 minutes according to your needs. Washing over,take clothes to the spinner tub and put plastic plate covering the clothes. Set spin timer,0~5mins,then take drained clothes out. Let clothes dry in the wind naturally

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I did not realize how small this item was... But it works perfectly well. It has already saved me so much time, effort, and energy. It's worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: love it works amazing, cleans my clothing, and the spin spins out the clothing almost dry like

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Portable Washing Machine
reviews.reviewText: Im sorry do not order this, I tried using it today and to be honest it’s too much work! You have wash, drain, fill and drain again to rinse then the tube to drain the water is short and must drain on the floor there’s no pressure for it to come out on its own! I pictures this wayyyy different but oh well!! I am not satisfied and I did not recommend purchasing this!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2nd time's a charm! 5 stars!
reviews.reviewText: After my first blue & white machine arrived damaged on Tuesday afternoon (probably due to the fault of the hasty deliverer), I returned it the following morning. The seller kept reaching out to me and quickly sent me the white & black one which arrived today (Friday) in perfect condition. I've washed & spun clothes with it multiple times today already. It arrived fast, on time, in great condition, and it works well. Both machines are also aesthetically beautiful in person. Another pro is that the spin cycle is almost silent yet my clothes came out nearly completely dry! I love this machine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This portable washer is very useful but the drainage pipe is quite short so that is a big problem. Putting it on top of a high rise table leading to the bath tub is the best option. I don’t know if anyone else has this issue but when I spin to dry. I used it once and the sides of the dryer are badly scratched from the intense pressure from spinning. I don’t know if everyone deals with this too but I’m scared it might crack open. I am talking with the seller if it does crack to get a full refund or replacement. Other than that it is quite useful and efficient. Just pretty heavy around 30 LBS for me maybe it is actually 22 LBS but feels like 30 LBS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love how I will not need to go to the basement from second floor to do light laundry after a procedure next month.Very easy to use. Cleans well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Out of the box I decided to wash a handful of washcloths to give it a test run. The washer was great but the spinner did not work at all. The manual/troubleshooting was not very clear so I'm unsure how to see if I can get it going. I'm a bit sad about it and I don't wanna go through the hassleof returning it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Small, quiet, affordable , easy to use. Love it 😁
